resources.string: The goal of this game is to mix primary colors to make secondary colors. Try tapping the hexes to cycle through the colors, then move on by hitting the arrow!
You can change the hexes marked
Now try with the hexes arranged together, then move on when you are ready!
Now try fitting this color template by changing the hexes! Some hexes may need to remain white.
Good Job! Now try heading into the play section.
If you need a reference for your colors, check the color wheel (tap to enlarge it)
